love-greeting.speaker: Lion-chan
love-greeting.text: Oh... it's you again.@ I was just... polishing the {likes} you gave me.@ It still catches the light so perfectly.

options.text: You seem happy to see me.
Can I ask you something about this area?

flusterlove.speaker: Lion-chan
flusterlove.text: S-stop saying things like that!@ You can't just... compliment me out of nowhere like that!@ You'll make me lose focus!

options.text: Guess I'm good at distracting you.
Sorry... you're just beautiful, that's all.

playful1.speaker: Lion-chan
playful1.text: Hmph...@ D-don't read too much into it.@ I just don't hate having you around anymore, that's all.

options.text: I'll take that as a compliment.

softbond.speaker: Lion-chan
softbond.text: You really are persistent...@ But maybe that's what I like about you.

options.text: Can you tell me about dangerous places around here?
What areas are safe to explore?

askhint.speaker: Lion-chan
askhint.text: Dangerous places, huh?@ You sure know how to pick your adventures.

options.text: I'd rather not die down here.

dangerhint1.speaker: Lion-chan
dangerhint1.text: Listen carefully, okay?@ The deeper zones — the ones where the light fades — aren't for the unprepared.

dangerhint1.speaker: Lion-chan
dangerhint1.text: If you go into the dark without something that glows...@ you won't come back.@ The creatures there hunt by sound and motion.

dangerhint1.speaker: Lion-chan
dangerhint1.text: So promise me you won't do anything stupid.@ Not unless you have a light or... me by your side.

options.text: Would you really come with me?

bondfluster.speaker: Lion-chan
bondfluster.text: W-what?! I didn't say that!@ I just mean... someone should keep an eye on you so you don't get yourself killed!

bondfluster.speaker: Lion-chan
bondfluster.text: Besides...@ if you disappeared down there...@ things would get a lot quieter around here. And I... don't want that.

safehint.speaker: Lion-chan
safehint.text: The coral fields near the east ridge are calm.@ Even small fish drift there to rest.@ If you need to recover, that's your best bet.

safehint.speaker: Lion-chan
safehint.text: Stay where the light reaches the sand.@ The current's weaker there... and I can keep an eye on you from the reef.

safehint.speaker: Lion-chan
safehint.text: N-not because I care that much!@ I just don't want to waste a perfectly good {likes} on someone who can't swim straight.

bondfinal.speaker: Lion-chan
bondfinal.text: Hmph... you're impossible.@ But... maybe that's what makes you interesting.

bondfinal.speaker: Lion-chan
bondfinal.text: Just don't make me regret caring about you, alright?
